Plot: A businesswoman is pursued by a psychopath after being locked in a parking garage on Christmas Eve.
Title: P2
Writer: Alexandre Aja (story), Grégory Levasseur (story), Franck Khalfoun (screenplay), Alexandre Aja (screenplay), Grégory Levasseur (screenplay)
Actors: Wes Bentley, Rachel Nichols, Simon Reynolds, Philip Akin
tomatoConsensus: P2 is full of gore, but low on suspense, featuring a cat-and-mouse plot has been done many times before.
